tool_description: Get the latest cryptocurrency prices and ranking.
name: Cryptocurrency
title: Cryptocurrency

api_list.name: Crypto / ID
api_list.description:
Get data from a specific cryptocurrency.

ID = Crypto name (example: bitcoin, ethereum)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency7.p.rapidapi.com/crypto/bitcoin"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency7.p.rapidapi.com/crypto/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
